definition: To assert a claim or demand ownership or control over something, often used in the context of asserting one's rights or making a request for exclusive use.

examples.german: Ich beanspruche dein Auto f√ºr den Tag.
examples.english: I claim your car for the day.
The repair takes a lot of time.

examples.german: Der Marathon beansprucht alle meine Energiereserven.
examples.english: The marathon exhausts all my energy reserves.

examples.german: Die Arbeit beansprucht meine volle Aufmerksamkeit.
examples.english: The work demands my full attention.

examples.german: Das Training beansprucht alle meine Muskeln.
examples.english: The training engages all my muscles.
